alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 3:43AM CDT until August 07 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 343 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Slapout, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodward, Mooreland, Fargo, Fort Supply, Sharon, May, and Tangier. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
